title: AITA: Is He An A*Hole For Using His Lacrosse Skills For Revenge?
description:
Every week we dive DEEP into the AITA (Am I The A*hole) thread on Reddit, and it’s FASCINATING.
It’s a bunch of real-life scenarios people are in where they could EASILY be the a*hole, but maybe – just maybe – once you hear all the details, you’ll understand it a little better and they won’t be SO much of an a*hole! Or maybe not.
Up today: His neighbor lets her dog poop on his lawn WITHOUT cleaning up after her dog. He's over it and decided to take matters into his own hands. He created a poop flinger to throw the poop back into her lawn. Does this make him an a*hole or not? We discuss.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
